item.title: Video Spokesperson - Greenscreen - Upwork
item.description:
Seeking a video spokesperson to deliver a friendly and casual explainer video for a local financial institution.

We're looking for someone who can film and record themselves in front of a green screen.

Client is a bank. The topic will be to explain the lending process and related steps to loan applicants.

Script will be provided: there is approximately 1 minute 45 seconds of content.

The video spokesperson we hire must film themselves on a green screen and provide us the video files. We will edit and mix the video.

Multiple takes are expected.

Client will have perpetual rights to use the video on their website. The video will be available to consumers visiting the client's website as they research how to apply for a loan.

Video will not be used for paid promotion.

We're looking for a female spokesperson who is friendly and conversational.

We will define a basic outfit (for instance: business casual blazer with white shirt). We may send the talent a client-branded shirt (such as an embroidered polo).


Posted On: June 30, 2024 20:01 UTC
Category: Acting
Skills:US English Dialect, Female, Explainer Video, Green Screen
Skills: US English Dialect, Female, Explainer Video, Green Screen
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Create voice over for 1 min classical music promo video - Upwork
item.description:
Overview:
We are seeking a talented and professional Voice Over Artist to provide the voice for a 1-minute promotional video highlighting an upcoming classical music performance at Carnegie Hall. The ideal candidate will have a warm, engaging, and articulate voice that can convey the sophistication and elegance of the event.

Responsibilities:

Record a high-quality voice over for the 1-minute promotional video.
Deliver the voice over in a timely manner, adhering to the provided script and direction.
Ensure the voice over aligns with the tone and style of classical music promotion.
Make necessary adjustments based on feedback.
Technical Requirements:

High-quality recording equipment (e.g., professional microphone, soundproof recording space).
Ability to deliver audio files in WAV or MP3 format.
Clear, neutral accent preferred; ability to enunciate and articulate words clearly.
Experience in voice modulation to match the mood and pace of the promotional video.
Basic audio editing skills to deliver clean, polished recordings.
Qualifications:

Previous experience in voice over work, particularly in promotional or classical music contexts.
A demo reel showcasing your voice over work.
Strong communication skills and ability to take direction.
Availability to meet deadlines and make revisions if needed.


Hourly Range: $15.00-$100.00
Posted On: June 30, 2024 19:17 UTC
Category: Voice Talent
Skills:Voice-Over
Skills: Voice-Over
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
